scene.title: End

mono.p: Heaven’s Pinnacle, Cloud Strider Stairway.
The Heaven’s Pinnacle towered over the sky, the mountain’s steps stretching over a thousand feet.
Looking up, the end of the stone stairs could not be seen, only misty clouds hanging halfway up.
The mountain was a tall mountain; on top of this mountain, resided an expert.
After climbing several thousand stone steps, a small temple called 「Fog Mount」 could be seen at the top of its peak.
Regardless of name, shape, or furnishings, this Fog Mount Temple was an exact replica of the former Celestial Phoenix’s abode on Mount Taixuan.
The master of this temple,
Was the Head of one of the Six Great Sects of Shenzhou: [School of Taixuan];
Phoenix’s eldest disciple: [Willowfoil] Lin Zhaoyu.
…The Head had a quiet nature, plus the road was long and arduous;
If the disciples of the School of Taixuan don’t have anything to do, they would never ascend the Cloud Strider Stairway.
Therefore, this day should’ve been an average day, a quiet and ordinary day.
Knock, knock, knock.

scene.text: [em delay=1] Knock, [/em][em delay=1] Knock, [/em][em delay=0.5] Knock.[/em]
There was an uninvited guest, who knocked on Fog Mount Temple’s door with a smile.

motion.img: 苏湄-自信-标准-中景（带武器）

scene.text: This person wore a bold and easy-to-move suit, carrying twin yin-yang swords, born with vermillion hair and a jade-like face, and looked very beautiful.

text.p: Although she rarely walked around in the Jianghu Society, and her disciples also kept a low profile;[\s]
But the name of this person was almost as prominent as the Heads and Elders of the Six Great Sects.
She was Phoenix’s second disciple, the current master of [Wushuang Sect],[\s]
[Unparalleled Fairy] ——Su Mei.

scene.text: Knock.
Her knuckles tapped on the wooden door lightly, the sound loud and undisturbed, it was slightly crisp and nice.

motion.img: 苏湄-标准-标准-远景（带武器）

scene.text: There wasn’t a response from the room, yet the red haired woman wasn’t angry, her smile calm.
Knock, knock.
Finally, the door opened.

text.p: As if she was unaware of the knocker’s long wait,
[Willowfoil] Lin Zhaoyu walked out of the house slowly, staring coldly at her former Second Junior Sister.

motion.img: 苏湄-甜笑-标准-远景（带武器）

scene.dialog: [Senior Sister, how long has it been since you’ve seen me?]
scene.text: Su Mei smiled enthusiastically, as if she was reuniting with a long lost best friend after many years. [\s]Although there were thousands of smiling faces in the world, this was the only one that left Lin Zhaoyu at a loss.

motion.img: 苏湄-平静-标准-远景（带武器）
苏湄-标准-标准-远景（带武器）

scene.text: [Unparalleled Fairy] Su Mei thought for a bit, before casually smiling:

text.p: Her sound floated into Lin Zhaoyu’s ears, like a thin needle pricking her heart.
She couldn’t help but glance at the woman in front of her with contempt.

scene.text: Over ten years had passed, yet Su Mei hadn't changed at all, and time seemed to have stopped for her.
Her hair was still red and vibrant,

text.p: Her beautiful face was shiny and smooth as fat, it could be broken by a blow.
Her eyes… the eyes were still so big, so alluring…
Her lips are so red, so red… this vixen, how many sheets of rouge paper did she use?

scene.text: [em color=#FAFAD2 italic]… …Why was it her? Why wasn’t it me?[/em]

motion.img: 苏湄-标准-标准-远景（带武器）

scene.text: Envy filled Lin Zhaoyu’s heart in an instant, it boiled extremely quickly, and it froze; it was hot like ice, it was cold like fire.
Su Mei seemed to see through her thoughts, and let out a sigh at this moment.

motion.img: 苏湄-闭目-标准-远景（带武器）

scene.text: The Head of the School of Taixuan replied softly.
scene.dialog: [There's no need to reminisce about old times. There's no point in chatting between you and me. Let's just get to the point.]

motion.img: 苏湄-瞥视-标准-远景（带武器）
苏湄-平静-标准-远景（带武器）

scene.text: A trace of haze seemed to pass over Su Mei’s eyes, and then it disappeared so quickly that Lin Zhaoyu doubted her own eyes.
scene.dialog: [...The reason I came to visit my Senior Sister, is because Little Ma got wind of a news.]
scene.text: Lin Zhaoyu’s face changed quickly, and sharply said:

mono.p: The name Little Ma that came from Su Mei’s mouth, was the two people’s Junior Brother [Tireless Courser] Ma Yanqing. [\s]
The Sixth Sword of Taixuan had an arrogant temperament, and had never been restrained by the world;
This person had a close relationship with [Unparalleled Fairy] Su Mei, and he was envied by everyone in the Jianghu Society.
Yet he suddenly announced that he would marry his Senior Sister who was more than twenty years older than him, which shook the Jianghu;
On the day of the wedding, he was drunk and nonsensical. He was ashamed of his name and abandoned it, which embarrassed all the guests.
Even after getting married, he rarely appeared in the School of Taixuan for a while.
For most of the year, he and his beloved horse [Nightblood] wandered around. What he did could be considered [chivalrous and righteous], and [acting recklessly] at worst.
From the rich and powerful to the gangsters and bandits... Ma Feima dared to beat anyone and offend anyone. This [Madman], was indeed the most famous character in the Central Plains.

dialog.p: [Yanqing… Little Ma hates that name very much.
Yet Senior Sister hasn’t changed her words yet… Alas, Senior Sister is the most nostalgic among us.]

text.p: [em color=#FAFAD2 italic]No…[/em]
Lin Zhaoyu said in her heart.
[em color=#FAFAD2 italic]What he hates is the past, specifically the past YOU created.[/em]
Her thoughts sank into her heart, and there was no sound.
Nor did she put it into words.

motion.img: 苏湄-闭目-标准-远景（带武器）

text.p: Lin Zhaoyu repeated.[\s]
Su Mei met her gaze quickly and looked away, then sighed:

motion.img: 苏湄-瞥视-标准-远景（带武器）

scene.dialog: [You know Little Ma’s temperament… he already rushed to the Northern Desert overnight.]
[Beyond the Great Wall? …What’s he going to do there?]

motion.img: 苏湄-标准-标准-远景（带武器）
苏湄-瞥视-标准-远景（带武器）

text.p: Fiery anger suddenly melted the ice.
Lin Zhaoyu took a big step forward, and silently slipped a silver longsword into her left hand.

dialog.p: [Su Mei… What the hell are you plotting now?
It’s been 20 years, do you think we’ll be fooled by you again?!]
[You think Yanqing and I don't know where Ling Shuang lives in seclusion?
Who do you think helped her escape from southern Hunan when she took a sword and traveled across the Central Plains, and when she was out of the limelight and causing trouble?

scene.dialog: Who was it that secretly protected her on her way to the Northern Desert and helped her settle?]

dialog.p: [Yanqing’s temperament… heh, I know Yanqing's character well, and I also know Lingshuang’s temperament.
Even if the sky fell tomorrow, he won’t disturb Lingshuang with such trivial things.

scene.dialog: So? Could you tell me what kind of news is so important, that Yanqing couldn’t even spare the time to tell me?]
[...It's still the same method, Su Mei, it's still the same. Yanqing is willing to listen to your words,『Little Ma』...hmph.
What about you? You call him at will, pointing east to east, pointing west to west… Who do you take my husband for? Who do you take ME for?]

dialog.p: If you no longer treasure shared sect comradery in your heart,
Then I won’t hesitate to fight,『Unparalleled Fairy』!]

text.p: All the words she'd been accumulating over the years came out, yet she felt unhappy.
Lin Zhaoyu was satisfied with the silence from the other party, but she was also surprised about that silence.
The wind howled, and piercing cold hovered on top of Heaven’s Pinnacle.
This kind of weather could either fan the flames of rage, or slowly let it smolder until only the ashes of disappointment remained.

scene.text: After she counted her seventeenth heartbeat, when her patience was about to come to an end, Su Mei spoke up.

motion.img: 苏湄-闭目-标准-远景（带武器）

scene.text: Su Mei didn’t look at her, rather her gaze fixedly fell upon the soft sword in her hand.

dialog.p: Thanks to it, Wanru could keep her life, and it gave Fifth Junior Sister a moment to stab her with that sword.]

motion.img: 苏湄-自信-标准-远景（带武器）

scene.text: She lifted her head to meet Lin Zhaoyu’s gaze, her eyebrows raised into a smile:
scene.dialog: [Very good, it’s still in your hands.]

text.p: At the mention of that day twenty years ago, Lin Zhaoyu subconsciously took a step back.[\s]
The cold air condensed to dew on her back, turning into cold sweat under her robes.
For many years, the scene of that time had been torturing her like bone decay.
She thought she had finally left her past behind, but the visit from her Second Sister today has reopened her old scar.
[We promised to never talk about the old days——]

scene.dialog: [Mm. I’m not talking about the old stuff, because the past is gone, and remembering it is useless.]

motion.img: 苏湄-闭目-标准-远景（带武器）
苏湄-平静-标准-远景（带武器）

scene.dialog: Lin Zhaoyu was taken aback, and instantly understood the profound meaning of her Junior Sister’s words.
scene.text: [S-so… you’re saying, Master s-she’s?]
scene.dialog: Su Mei looked up at the sky, as if she noticed something interesting in the air, and had an indiscernible smile.

motion.img: 苏湄-微笑-别过-远景（带武器）

scene.text: [Our Xuanyuan Swords are about to be unsheathed again. But if the estimate is correct - I will do it earlier than you.]
For the first time in 20 years, the School of Taixuan’s female head showed such a flustered expression.

dialog.p: [Right, but does death exist for Celestials? Trust me, Master has returned.
You, me, Little Ma… none of us seven can think of staying out of this matter.]

scene.text: Lin Zhaoyu looked down in a daze, as if the other party was just saying extremely absurd gossip that wasn’t worth listening to.
Her murmurs became weaker.

text.p: When she lifted her head at Su Mei again, a smile hung on Lin Zhaoyu’s face.
It was an extremely angry smile, yet it was also extremely weary.

scene.dialog: [If Master is to settle out the score years ago, the first one she will look for is you, Su Mei.]
scene.text: The School of Taixuan’s female head spoke softly.

motion.img: 苏湄-痛苦-别过-远景（带武器）

scene.dialog: [Wrong, wrong, Master doesn’t know who the mastermind was. According to the order, I’m still the second one~ But, the order isn’t important, that's why I came to find you.]

motion.img: 苏湄-平静-标准-远景（带武器）
林朝雨-心头一震-持剑-远景

scene.text: She turned to look away from the clouds and gazed at Lin Zhaoyu.

text.p: Lin Zhaoyu was shocked.[\s]
She was very familiar with this look her Second Junior Sister had in her eyes.

motion.img: 苏湄-标准-标准-远景（带武器）

scene.text: Su Mei looked at her calmly, calm and composed. There was neither fear nor panic.
